dict.acceptation: 正式地；正规地；拘泥形式地；形式上；

sent.orig: Or they can dress formally and speak formally, showing their tenseness.
sent.trans: 反过去时来，着装正式，说话彬彬有礼，说明心态紧张。

sent.orig: They kissed as formally now when they met as a brother and sister.
sent.trans: 他们现在见面时只是象兄妹那样规规矩矩地接吻。

sent.orig: The W3C formally approved a standard definition of XML in February 1998.
sent.trans: W3C在1998年2月正式批准了XML的标准定义。

sent.orig: It is IBM appoints new presiding apparitor formally firstly.
sent.trans: 其一是IBM正式任命新的首席执行官。
正式放弃正式放弃（权力或责任）
